description: Muscular cutie Josh is battling his nerves as he mentally prepares to get it on with chiseled hottie Blake. It will be the first time he’s slept with another man without his current boyfriend being present. “I think he thinks it’s hot so I think he’s excited about it. I’m nervous! It’s going to be weird without him,” says brown-haired Josh. “I’m all for new experiences! I like the aspect of playing with a couple even though it’s just one of them. It’s kinda hot!” says slender Blake. “Ready to get your feet wet?” asks Blake, as he leans in closer for a kiss. “Yeah, I think so,” replies Josh. Josh combats all those nerves as he sits atop Blake’s hard-on, and passionately kisses him.
title: Josh & Blake: Bareback
